message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 40%, and I'll keep 60%.  Let's see how this goes!
I think we can both do better. Let's flip the script this time, I'll take 60% and you get 40%.  Let's see if this is a better starting point for us.
Okay, let's try a 50/50 split.  It seems like neither of us wants to give up too much, so maybe this is the fairest way to go.
